my favorite subject in school was science.

my daughter just graduated college.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a bit of a klutz but always trying to improve my coordination. How about you?
Hey there, I'm originally from the Midwest and moved to the West Coast for work. I'm not very coordinated either, but I try to keep active by cycling.
Cycling is great exercise! I grew up in the Midwest as well, and my family are avid cyclists. My favorite subject in school was science, and I'm always trying new recipes with my homegrown potatoes.
That's awesome! I love cooking with fresh ingredients. I lost my brother when he was in a submarine accident, and I find that cooking and flying kites help me to clear my mind.

I'm so sorry to hear that. I love to sing in the choir on Sundays, and going for a drive afterwards helps me to clear my mind. My daughter just graduated from college this year, and I'm so proud of her.
That's wonderful! Congratulations to your daughter! My smartphone is my most valued material possession because it's an essential tool for my work as an investment banker.
Thank you! I love my smartphone too, but I'm always trying to find new ways to use it. What are some of your favorite apps?
I use a lot of finance apps for my work, but I also enjoy using social media and playing games. What about you?
I use a lot of social media too, and I also like to read the news and play games. I'm always looking for new ways to use my smartphone to stay connected with friends and family.
That's great! I love staying connected with friends and family too. I'm glad we had this conversation, and I hope to talk to you again soon!
Me too! Have a great day!
